appendix-app-p-1: RRS-OACIS has a mechanism called "App" that extends the function of RRS-OACIS.
appendix-app-p-2: "Run" for simulation and "Competition" used in the convention are also implemented as App. By creating and introducing your own "App", you can use it according to the purpose of research.
appendix-app-create-p-1: Please refer to Readme.md below this repository.
